제목에서 암시하다시피, 원하시는 분들의 이력서를 서로 공유하는 것을 제안하고자 합니다.
그 취지는 잡을 구하는 사람에서 아주 좋은 툴이 됨과 동시에, 자신의 위치와 능력을 제 점검할 수 있는 좋은 기회가 될 것이라고 생각합니다.
원하시는 분의 이름을 남겨주십시요.(암호 :1)
최덕선 고상호 이성기 박영선 김경환
*** I would like to clarify some of the concerns briefly. 1. First of all, this is only voluntary participations as we do in our community. 2. Second, we better answer "why we want to share" and "why we can not share". When these questions are reasonable/acceptable to yourself, then we can do actions. Many of experts posted their profiles in the public(internet) to advertise themself. Some people share their work(code) in the open source communities. 3. Third, this suggestion is not only for the job seeker but also the people who working now. The reason is that we are working in a very fast-paced environments. So I think it is nice to be equipped with some tools and some examples to be competitive in a very competitive situations. 4. Fourth, again we better answer "does this profile contain too confidentail or sensitive information to show to others ? address/phone#/email address...etc. I would like to leave to you to decide. Personally, I do not see too personal information. 5. Finally, I would like to honor many of our memebers who are helping all the time through the seminars and off-line times. I understand some worries and concerns about this suggestions publicly, but it is up to us how to utilize in a constructive ways.
